topics.body:
Why I love /mlp/

>"So, let me see if I have this right darling, you don't like Anthro."
"No, it sucks and Its against the rules, anyone who likes Anthro is cancer."
>"And you don't like generals."
"Generals are also cancer, all generals are always bad."
>"And you don't like anything that's an offshoot of our show?"
"Anything that isn't specifically cannon or written by lauren faust herself is utter trash. There is no merit to it whatsoever."
>"So no fan material either?"
"None, zero, fan material is all cancer."
>"But fan material inspired the movies!"
"Movies are also Cancer! Both movies suck, they're crap, flash sentry is shit, it's bad fanfiction and it's not cannon in my book."
>"But at least you have a loving and supportive communi-"
"Hugbox! Gay! 
>"Shipping?"
"All ships are autistic."
>"Well what do you like?"
"Only things that have hooves, gryphons, or any other species that isn't a pony is garbage."

[spoiler]*I HAVE ENOUGH OF YOUR SHIT, RELIGIOUS POLITICS!*[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54db15676368727064cf0b00#post_54db15676368727064cf0b00
Look up _"Valentines Day Malaysia controversy"_.

Seriously, I understand if you don't celebrate or support it but the Muslims here, they *condemn* the holiday. They literally make it terrible for everyone else and they go around schools, telling innocent kids how it's bad and you too should stop it. They will make protests, public hating and other crazy stuff. Even the government is involved! Hell, politicians use this to their advantage by making their image better through publicly protesting about this and "teaching" kids about the sins of this holiday.

Fuck it! I love my country and I myself am a patriot, but sometimes I just think that my own race or religion is controlled by a bunch of stereotypes, fascists, general haters and SJWs, and everyone is OK with that!

This is why I like the Chinese better. Heck, my best friend is one and he isn't a dick like the other people of my race and religion has to offer.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
